description: Just 25 minutes is all you need to whip up this prawn salad recipe. Grilled corn and capsicum add a lovely smokiness to this Mexican-inspired dish.
keywords: Prawn salad,Quick & easy dinner,Prawn,Salad,Quick & easy lunch
name: Mexican-Style Prawn Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 corn cobs, husks and silks removed
1 red capsicum, halved, desseeded, roughly chopped
420g black beans no added salt, rinsed, drained
1 little gem lettuce, leaves separated, torn
1kg cooked tiger prawns, peeled, deveined, tails intact

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a barbecue grill or chargrill pan over high heat. Combine oil and spice blend in a medium shallow dish. Add corn and capsicum, then toss to coat. Grill corn for 10 minutes, turning, or until golden and tender, cooking capsicum for the last 5 minutes.
Zest and juice 1 lime. Combine aioli, zest and lime juice in a small bowl. Cut remaining lime into wedges.

Using a sharp knife, remove kernels from cobs in chunks. Place beans, lettuce, capsicum, corn, prawns and coriander in a large bowl and toss to combine. Season with pepper. Serve salad with lime wedges and drizzled with aioli mixture.
